disabled: Pasaport devre dışı bırakıldığından artık kullanılamaz.
no_member: This member is no longer in this server and therefore cannot be verified, unverified or punished.

success.unbanned: {user} has been successfully unbanned, you will have to re-invite them manually.
success.unbanned_invite: You can just send them {url} per Direct Message!
success.verified: {user} has been verified and given the {role} role.
success.unverified: {user} has been unverified, they can now re-verify.
